heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Widely scattered rain showers. Highs in the mid to upper 50s in the south, and upper 40s to mid 50s north. Winds light from the south, except 5 to 10 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Rain showers likely early, then diminishing, and possibly mixing with snow late in the northern mountains, and near the international border. Lows in the low to mid 30s. Southwest winds 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Thursday, Thanksgiving Day
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Chance of a rain or snow shower north, except scattered to numerous snow showers in the St. Lawrence Valley, with a trace to 2 inches. Blustery, with valley highs from the mid 30s to lower 40s. Southwest winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 30 mph.
